name: Doctor Klein
descriptions: Doctor Klein is a pre-War scientist and the leader of the Think Tank operating in Big MT in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Old World Blues.

Once an esteemed doctor and serving in the role of the Chief/Head Researcher of Logistical Operations and "Ideology" at the Big MT Research and Development Center, sometime after the Great War devastated the U.S.A., the future Dr. Klein and his fellow executives underwent a procedure to extract their brains and place them in robotic think tank shells to continue their work. It was his idea for the Think Tank to survive as brain bots.

At some point before 2281, the Think Tank's amoral and irrational research methods compelled their colleague, the future Doctor Mobius, to use his own knowledge to hack into their robotic forms, erasing their memories of the world beyond Big MT and of pre-War America, in an effort to restrain the Think Tank's destructive potential. However, he was forced to leave them and shelter in the "Forbidden Zone" where he sends a looped message of threats of death and destruction to reinforce their warped mindset.

Klein frequently demonstrates an incredible overconfidence in his intelligence, as he shows absolutely no grasp of the purpose or function of the advanced technology he tasks the Courier to retrieve. He also remains very disrespectful of his colleagues and often ignores and criticizes them for suggesting what actions the Think Tank should take. He also proves that he is not above deliberately censoring or outright ignoring evidence that would discredit him.
Along with his original name and human memories, Klein has lost much of his knowledge of human anatomy, and refers to the Courier's fingers and toes as "penises."
Doctor Klein appears only in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Old World Blues.
role: Chief head researcher of logistical operations and idea-ologyOld World Blues antagonist

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: THANK YOU FOR WHAT YOU HAVE DONE. THE HELPING, THAT IS. WE LIKE THAT.

topics.topic_text: I have other questions for you.
topics.response_text: MORE?{Beat}VERY WELL. DO YOUR ASKING, THEN.

topics.topic_text: Dr. Mobius' message - can you replay it?
topics.response_text: IF YOU MUST. HE'S CLEARLY DERANGED. ALL RIGHT, WHERE IS THE INFERNAL PLAY BUTTON? AH. HERE.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03DialogueKleinBigMTRandom
topics.response_text: {2D Announcement}DR. MOBIUS, SURRENDER YOURSELF. YOU CANNOT WIN DESPITE THE FACT THAT THE ODDS ARE HEAVILY IN YOUR FAVOR.

topics.topic_text: That doesn't explain the laser-sutures on my chest... and on my spine.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Admonishing}DALA. WAS IT NECESSARY{Emph}THIS TIME?

topics.topic_text: Doesn't sound like my style. Maybe I'll do a little exploring.
topics.response_text: YOU WOULD NOT DARE. PERHAPS I CAN CHANGE YOUR MIND... USING THE GREATEST OF OUR SCIENCES. THE FENCE.

topics.topic_text: Then can you help me get this done as quickly as possible? Sounds like a lot of walking.
topics.response_text: AH, THAT IS CORRECT. YOU MUST{Emph}WALK UPON YOUR MANY-PENISED FEET.{Emph, condescending}MUCH SLOWER THAN OUR ADVANCED HOVERING ROBOTICAL FRAMES.

topics.topic_text: Pylons? What pylons?
topics.response_text: THE RADAR FENCE THAT SURROUNDS THE BIG MT CRATER WILL PREVENT - ER, PROTECT YOU FROM STRAYING BEYOND THE FACILITY.

topics.topic_text: Why can't you go out there and shut them down?
topics.response_text: OUT THERE? WE'RE NOT GOING OUT THERE. IT'S DANGEROUS. WE'RE SMART, NOT SUICIDAL.

topics.topic_text: Uh... thanks.
topics.response_text: THEY ARE IRRITATING.

topics.topic_text: This sonic gun looks like an energy projectile. Got anything that spits lead?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] WHAT DID IT SAY? SPIT "LEAD?" WHAT, LIKE PENCILS?

topics.topic_text: Energy Cells have a high expenditure rate. Some extra reserve cells could offset that.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] HMMM. YES, I BELIEVE WATTZ ELECTRONICS TENDED TO MAKE THE BATTERY SHELF LIFE ON THE LOW END.

topics.topic_text: You removed my brain?
topics.response_text: CIRCUMVENTING THE PACIFICATION FIELD. THIS IS A NO-NO.{Beat}WE HAVE NEVER BEEN IN A FIGHT. WE DO NOT WANT THAT.

topics.topic_text: So genius, what now?
topics.response_text: YES. HMMM. AH, YES. YESSS... YES... AH. HMMM.

topics.topic_text: Yes... what?
topics.response_text: NO... I MEAN YES. JUST NEED TO ANALYZE THESE TECHNOLOGIES FOR A MOMENT. THEY ARE EXTREMELY ADVANCED, YOU KNOW.

topics.topic_text: Do you even know what these technologies do?
topics.response_text: {Defensive}I KNOW HOW THESE TECHNOLOGIES WORK.{Beat}OF COURSE I KNOW.

topics.topic_text: Maybe the frequency in the Sonic Emitter's a sonic key of sorts? Like an electronic lockpick?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Thinking}ITS RANGE IS LIMITED, AND IT WOULD NEED A BOOSTER OF SOME SORT, A... CARRIER, BUT...

topics.topic_text: Would the suit's dampening abilities allow me to sneak into the Forbidden Zone?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I SUPPOSE IT COULD. IF IT COULD BE QUIET FOR MORE THAN A FEW MOMENTS, ALWAYS TALKING, TOUCHING THINGS...

topics.topic_text: The antenna, any chance it was damaged, or broke the X-2 array once removed?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] SO YOU'RE SAYING... IT'S THE X-2{Emph}ARRAY, NOT THE ANTENNA I SHOULD BE EXAMINING? THAT WAS... MOST LIKELY MY PLAN, YES.

topics.topic_text: Look, the antenna focuses brainwave patterns, right?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] YES, THAT'S WHAT I BELIEVE I SAID.

topics.topic_text: And the suit's a cardiac regulator, and the sonic frequency is a spinal vibrator?
topics.response_text: I'VE GOT IT. THE CARDIAC REGULATOR IN THE SUIT, THE ANTENNA FOR BRAINWAVES, AND THE SONIC FREQUENCY FOR THE VERTEBRAL NERVES...

topics.topic_text: Yes?
topics.response_text: I'M THINKING. THIS IS ALL VERY COMPLICATED.

topics.topic_text: Do you think I killed Mobius?
topics.response_text: YES. WAIT. YOU DID, DIDN'T YOU?

topics.topic_text: Mobius and I talked it over, reached an understanding.
topics.response_text: YOU ARE LYING. NO, YOU ARE NOT. YOUR HEARTBEAT, PERSPIRATION... ALL EXCESSIVELY CONFIDENT AND SURE OF YOURSELF.

topics.topic_text: I can't let you dissect the Mojave. Or let you leave.
topics.response_text: YES, YOU CAN. YOU DON'T REALLY HAVE AN ALTERNATIVE THAT I CAN SEE.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> You think I am the Lobotomite...? No, for my skull houses the BRAIN OF MOBIUS!
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] THAT IS THE MOST INSANE THING I'VE EVER HEARD. THERE IS NO WAY MOBIUS WOULD... CONDESCEND TO STEP INSIDE YOU.

topics.topic_text: COUNTLESS brain extraction surgeries exist... but only one IMPLANTATION one - from MOBIUS!
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{DUPE}YOU SPEAK THE TRUTH. AND THE DECIBEL VARIATION IN YOUR VOICE... IT IS MOBIUS.

topics.topic_text: Nothing is unpossible for SCIENCE! Mesons, lasers, atoms, brainwaves... all are at MY command!
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] YOU SPEAK THE TRUTH. AND THE DECIBEL VARIATION IN YOUR VOICE... IT IS MOBIUS.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> Do you think I killed Mobius? No, he lives.
topics.response_text: YOU MUST HAVE KILLED HIM. HE WOULDN'T HAVE JUST LET YOU WALK IN, TAKE YOUR BRAIN... WOULD HE?

topics.topic_text: He offers a deal - stay here, stay put, and he'll let you live.
topics.response_text: THAT'S NO DEAL AT ALL! THERE'S A WHOLE WORLD BEYOND THE CRATER... FILLED WITH IDEAS AND POSSIBILITIES!

topics.topic_text: You FOOLS had best listen. Or MOBIUS will bring his army here, to sting you STUPID.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] THAT SOUNDS LIKE SOMETHING MOBIUS WOULD SAY.

topics.topic_text: You can still do that... here, quietly, for me.
topics.response_text: FOR YOU? AND FOR SCIENCE?

topics.topic_text: I... was at a theater, then... I was here. What is this place?
topics.response_text: DID... DID IT JUST SAY SOMETHING? ANYONE CATCH THAT?{Bore-Ose}BOROUS, YOU WORK WITH ANIMALS, TRANSLATE.

topics.topic_text: Yes. I'm guessing that crashed satellite was yours?
topics.response_text: THOSE WERE WORDS, WEREN'T THEY? IN THE FORM OF QUESTIONS. IT'S ASKING ME QUESTIONS. IS THIS SOME KIND OF TRICK?

topics.topic_text: <Wave hands and nod.>
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Slight Surprise, alarm}WHAT... WHAT IS IT DOING? DID WE INSTITUTE ELECTROSHOCK?{Beat, horrified}OR IS IT EXCRETING?

topics.topic_text: <Hold up one finger, point at self. Point at them, hold up five fingers.>
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Shaken, backs off}NOW IT'S HOLDING UP AN ARRAY OF FULLY-ERECT HAND PENISES. IF IT TRIES TO INSERT THEM, ACTIVATE VIVISECTORS.

topics.topic_text: < Debug Topic Node - Do Not Translate. >
topics.response_text: AND DR. MOBIUS MOCKS US. DID YOU SEE HIS CRACKED MONITOR? HE'S CLEARLY LET HIMSELF GO.

topics.topic_text: Who is Dr. Mobius?
topics.response_text: DR. MOBIUS WAS... NOT THE HORRIFYING CREATURE YOU SAW UPON THE SCREEN, TWISTED BY SCIENCE. HE WAS ONCE ONE OF US. A FRIEND.

topics.topic_text: Why do I have this strange... passive sensation in here?
topics.response_text: IT'S A SIDE EFFECT OF THE CEREBRAL SCRUBBING. IT WON'T STOP YOU FROM EXCRETING - OR ASKING QUESTIONS, APPARENTLY. HAVE TO CORRECT THAT NEXT TIME.

topics.topic_text: What is this place?
topics.response_text: THIS... IS THE THINK TANK, THE NERVE CENTER OF BIG MT, THE GREATEST RESEARCH CENTER KNOWN TO MAN. AND TO US.

topics.topic_text: I'd like to know about the Forbidden Zone.
topics.response_text: THAT GLOWING RED SCAR? THAT LASER-LOBOTOMY-CANYON-MAZE CARVED IN THE LANDSCAPE AS IF BY SOME{Emph}CHILD? IT IS MOBIUS' "FORTRESS."

topics.topic_text: You seem like the one in charge. You are...?
topics.response_text: I AM DR. KLEIN, CHIEF HEAD RESEARCHER OF LOGISTICAL OPERATIONS AND IDEA-OLOGY HERE AT BIG MT.

topics.topic_text: Why the anti-aggression programming?
topics.response_text: WE HAD TO TAKE PRECAUTIONS AFTER THE LAST VISITORS. THEY CAUSED A GREAT DEAL OF DAMAGE IN A SHORT TIME.

topics.topic_text: Who were these visitors?
topics.response_text: DR. 8 AND DR. O COULD TELL YOU MORE. DR. O MORE THAN 8, THE BATTLE AGAINST THE VISITORS DAMAGED 8'S VOICE MODULE.

topics.topic_text: I've heard this place called the "Big Empty."
topics.response_text: YES, BECAUSE THE INTELLECTUALLY CHALLENGED SEE AN "M" AND A "T" NEXT TO EACH OTHER AND TAKE OCCAM'S RAZOR TO IT.

topics.topic_text: You said something about needing technologies to stop Mobius?
topics.response_text: YES. IT IS OUR ONLY CHANCE, A DESPERATE PLAN THAT CAME TO US AFTER MOBIUS' FIRST BROADCAST.

topics.topic_text: First, you scoop out my brain, now you want me to save you?!
topics.response_text: THAT IS CORRECT, YES.{Beat, not sure, calculating}I HOPE YOU'RE NOT DEMONSTRATING RESENTMENT NOW.{Conclusion}IF YOU ARE, WELL, WE CAN'T HAVE THAT.

topics.topic_text: No, I'm not going to help you.
topics.response_text: OH.

topics.topic_text: Why me? Can't you do it?
topics.response_text: UM. NO.

topics.topic_text: I'll help. What do you need me to do?
topics.response_text: EXCELLENT.{Beat}THIS IS TURNING OUT MUCH BETTER THAN THE ACTIVATE-THE-RETREAT-PROTOCOLS-AND-COWER-IN-MY-ROOM IDEA I HAD EARLIER.

topics.topic_text: No? Why not?
topics.response_text: ENOUGH. WE NEED YOUR HELP. WILL YOU HELP US?

topics.topic_text: I can say "no," and I'll do it again. I'm leaving.
topics.response_text: LEAVING? BUT YOU CAN'T. I DON'T MEAN THAT AS A THREAT.{Slightly confused.}

topics.topic_text: What makes you so sure Mobius has my brain?
topics.response_text: WE HAVE NO IDEA! THIS LINE OF QUESTIONING ISN'T IMPORTANT TO US RIGHT NOW! WHY ARE YOU ASKING THESE TANGENTIAL QUESTIONS? STOP IT!

topics.topic_text: The faster I can get through this, the better.
topics.response_text: OUR INTENTIONS EXACTLY. THE IMPORTANT THING IS YOU RUSH QUICKLY THROUGH THIS TASK SO AS NOT TO WASTE{Emph}OUR TIME.

topics.topic_text: What if I take my time, explore the crater?
topics.response_text: {Slight anger}WHAT ILLOGIC IS THIS?! KEEP YOUR FILTHY PENIS-TIPPED FEET OUT OF OUR LABS AND SECRETS!

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me more about these pylons?
topics.response_text: ASK BOROUS. I BELIEVE HE KNOWS MORE ABOUT THE FENCE THAN ANY BRAIN. EXCEPT MAYBE MOBIUS.

topics.topic_text: < Debug Topic Node - Gun Branch/Skill Check Storage - Do Not Translate. >
topics.response_text: IF WE'RE GOING TO BRING THE SOCRATIC METHOD INTO IT, FINE. GIVE THE LOBOTO-BEAR A COMBUSITON GUN. BOROUS? DON'T YOU HAVE SOMETHING LIKE THAT?

topics.topic_text: I don't give a shit what you have to say. Tell me why you hauled me here. Now.
topics.response_text: {Curious, slow}THAT RESPONSE SEEMED DEMANDING, AS IF CUTTING TO THE CASE.{Corrects}UH... CHASE. HOW SURGICAL.{Thinking}REMINDS ME OF...

topics.topic_text: Um, this gun looks really hungry. I'd like to make sure it gets fed lots of bullets.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] FINE. BOROUS, MORE AMMO. THE GOOD STUFF.

topics.topic_text: < Debug Topic Node - Sonic Emitter Node Storage - Do Not Translate. >
topics.response_text: {Irritated}WHAT IS IT?{Explaining his irritation, more insistent, quieter}THE LOBOTOMITE IS{emph}ASKING ME THINGS, O, AND I AM TRYING TO IGNORE THEM. MY PROCESSORS CAN'T IGNORE YOU{emph}BOTH AT THE SAME TIME.

topics.topic_text: If you have the gun already, I don't understand what you need.
topics.response_text: IT IS TRULY THE END OF ALL INTELLIGENCE WHEN THE LOBOTOMITE SPEAKS MORE WISDOM THAN YOU "GENIUSES."

topics.topic_text: So just plug it into the circular map-thing in the Sink upstairs?
topics.response_text: YES. YOU MAY NEED TO WIGGLE IT IN A BIT, BUT DON'T FORCE IT. WE CAN'T RE-CODE THEM IF YOU BREAK IT.

topics.topic_text: This chip looks like it was mass-produced. Are there other chips?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] ARE THERE OTHER CHIPS?

topics.topic_text: So I just go back upstairs and to the main circular console?
topics.response_text: YES. SIMPLY... SPEAK TO IT. WITH VERBAL WORDS TRANSMITTING IN AN OPEN AIR MEDIUM.

topics.topic_text: I have some questions about this "brain extraction" you all performed.
topics.response_text: WELL,{Emph}WE DIDN'T ACTUALLY DO IT. WE TRIED TO CLEAN UP AFTER, AS ALWAYS, BUT USUALLY THE AUTO-DOC RUNS ON REMOTE. BUT WE PROGRAMMED IT. OR, MOBIUS DID.

topics.topic_text: You said before that Mobius might have my brain?
topics.response_text: YES. IN ALL PROBABLE LIKELIHOODS, YES. POSSIBLY.

topics.topic_text: Why would Mobius want my brain?
topics.response_text: WHY DOES HE SEEK OUR DESTRUCTION? WHY DID HE BUILD ROBOT SCORPIONS WITH INTELLIGENCE-DRAINING STINGERS?

topics.topic_text: < Debug Topic Node - Act 2 Skill Check Segments - Do Not Translate. >
topics.response_text: LET ME CHECK SOMETHING... OF COURSE!

topics.topic_text: So I go after him, then?
topics.response_text: THE DOOR SHOULD BE UN-SEALED.{Moment of triumph}NOW, INSTEAD OF BEING SUBJECTED TO THREATS, WE CAN NOW SEND AN EQUALLY THREATENING MESSAGE TO MOBIUS.

topics.topic_text: Don't these items seem more... biologically-focused than that, though?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Thinking}BIOLOGICAL? PFF. RIDICULOUS.

topics.topic_text: I heard one of the previous visitors to the Dome spoke to you, asked you some questions.
topics.response_text: HMM? OH YES, THE LAST VISITOR... WELL, THE ONE JUST BEFORE YOU.{Thinking back}HAD AN INTERESTING NAME FROM SOME LANGUAGE THAT'S ALMOST UNPOSSIBLE TO SPEAK.{Klein's referring to "Latin" here for the language.}

topics.topic_text: The cardiac, spinal, and brainwave aspects of this tech... couldn't they heal me?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Thinking}HEAL YOU? WHAT, PUT YOU BACK TOGETHER LIKE SOME GIANT HARD-BOILED YUMYUM DEVILED EGG?{(YumYum is a specific brand of deviled egg in Fallout.)}

topics.topic_text: What exactly is the plan? You're losing me in the generalities, I need specifics.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] THE PLAN IS VERY COMPLICATED. WE ARE STILL CALCULATING HOW IT WOULD WORK IF IT SUCCEEDED. THAT IS OUR PART OF THE PLAN.

topics.topic_text: I can trade with the Sink Intelligence? Then I'll need something to activate that function, won't I?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I CANNOT DISPUTE YOUR LOGIC. DO WE HAVE OBJECTS TO ACTIVATE THE CHIP'S EXCHANGE ROUTINES?

topics.topic_text: What's this Auto-Doc surgery code you mentioned?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] MOBIUS' LEGACY CODE WAS IN THE OLD AUTO-DOC, YES. IT FRIED ITSELF AFTER YOUR PROCEDURE, SO WE COULDN'T TELL FOR SURE.

topics.topic_text: Mobius set up the Auto-Doc medical routines, so you think he's responsible for the post-organ-dump?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] YES. ALWAYS LEAVES BACKDOORS INTO THINGS, HAVE TO KEEP FINDING THEM AND CLOSING THEM.

topics.topic_text: My brain would know?
topics.response_text: IT CAN "COMMUNICATE" THE PROCEDURE WHEN WE EXAMINE IT. IT IS CONCEIVABLE TO TRACE ITS SURGICAL{"Footprints"}SCALPELPRINTS ONCE WE HAVE THE BRAIN.

topics.topic_text: These mechanical Robo-Scorpions "consume" intelligence? Are you certain of your findings?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{emph}DR. O IS CERTAIN OF HIS FINDINGS. AND NO ONE ELSE IN THE THINK TANK IS WILLING TO TEST THE RESULTS. LOSS OF BRAINIAL POWER - TERRIFYING.

topics.topic_text: Robo-Scorpions drain intelligence from living creatures - how? Chems?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I AM NOT CERTAIN. PERHAPS IT ONLY AFFECTS MACHINES. IF SO, YOU MAY BE IMMUNE.

topics.topic_text: You all seem knowledgeable in your fields. No doubt there's much you can share with me.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] WHY, YES. WE ARE FILLED WITH THE KNOWLEDGE YOU SPEAK OF.

topics.topic_text: I'd be honored if I could hear any knowledge the Think Tank had to share on the sciences.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{DUPE}WHY, YES. WE ARE FILLED WITH THE KNOWLEDGE YOU SPEAK OF.

topics.topic_text: Sounds to me like your math is wrong - and the odds aren't good.
topics.response_text: NONSENSE. THE MATHEMATICS OF THE SITUATION ARE ON OUR SIDE, LOBOTOMITE. I BELIEVE... NO WAIT, HMM. CARRY THE TWO... THEN...

topics.topic_text: It's not a democracy, it's a research facility. And over half your colleagues dispute your findings.
topics.response_text: YOU DARE USE LOGIC AGAINST ME?!

topics.topic_text: Maybe you should confer with your colleagues first.
topics.response_text: NONSENSE. "CONFER?" "COLLEAGUES?" THOSE ARE TWO WORDS I DO NOT RECOGNIZE.

topics.topic_text: I will PERMIT you to do this. For ME.
topics.response_text: PARTNER WITH YOU? MY{emph}FOE? MY RIVAL?! MY FOREMOST CRITIC?!

topics.topic_text: I found my brain, now you and I are going to settle things.
topics.response_text: I RECOMMEND WATCHING YOUR TONE WITH ME, LOBOTOMITE.

topics.topic_text: I'm not handing my brain over... there's some things we should discuss.
topics.response_text: {Disdainful}AND WHAT COULD WE POSSIBLY HAVE TO SPEAK ABOUT. YOU HAVE THE BRAIN. WE HAVE THE TECHNOLOGY. ALL YOU MUST DO... IS SURRENDER.

topics.topic_text: I think you're past due for your lobotomy, Klein.
topics.response_text: A... FIGHT? I... I'VE NEVER BEEN IN A FIGHT. WHAT... UH, WHAT, WHAT, WHAT DO I...

topics.topic_text: This whole place sounds dangerous. These devices sound dangerous.
topics.response_text: NONSENSE. THIS PLACE IS NO MORE DANGEROUS THAN A NUCLEAR DETONATION SITE, OUR TECHNOLOGIES NO MORE LETHAL THAN AN OVERCHARGED TESLA CANNON.

topics.topic_text: What are these technologies?
topics.response_text: THE TECHNOLOGIES ARE THE X-2 TRANSMITTER ANTENNA ARRAY, USED TO FOCUS COHERENT THOUGHT AT EXCESSIVELY HIGH FREQUENCIES.

topics.topic_text: I'll head out, then, and be back with these... things.
topics.response_text: WELL. GOOD. WHAT ARE THE TOKEN WORDS SPOKEN IN THIS CASE... UH... "THANK YOU?" YES - THANK. YOU.

topics.topic_text: Wait... so this gun you gave me can disable Force Fields?
topics.response_text: YES.

topics.topic_text: This can only work on fields here in the crater?
topics.response_text: YES. BUT NOT CURRENTLY.

topics.topic_text: You took out my brain, heart, and spine?
topics.response_text: THAT AUTO-DOC-JUNKHEAP WAS ONE OF MOBIUS' CREATIONS, LIKE THE REST OF THE TALKING SCRAP METAL IN THE ATTIC.

topics.topic_text: This amount clearly represents a deficiency in the amount of caps needed.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] AGAIN, YOUR LOGIC IS UNASSAILABLE IN ITS SIMPLISTIC NEED. O?

topics.topic_text: I'd hate to come back and ask for more. A little extra would guarantee you're not disturbed.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] IF I WERE NOT AS INTELLIGENT AS I AM, I WOULD FEEL AS IF PERHAPS I AM BEING TRICKED. UNPOSSIBLE. O - MORE.

topics.topic_text: Hold on, let's be logical about this. I don't need a ton, just as much as I can carry in trade.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] AGAIN, THE LOGIC OF THE REQUEST IS CLEAR. TONNAGE IS NOT NEEDED, ONLY ADEQUATE WEIGHT. EVERYONE, DISPLAY YOUR THINGS.

topics.topic_text: I've recovered all the technological information.
topics.response_text: WHAT? YOU DID? YOUR SURVIVAL, LET ALONE SUCCESS, BARELY REGISTERED ON MY PROJECTIONS.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03DialogueKleinPlayerReclaimedTech
topics.response_text: {2D Announcement}WELL DONE, LOBOTOMITE. SOON, THE TECHNOLOGIES WILL BE SAFE.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03EndingSlideFlag02
topics.response_text: {Narration}It refers to those so obsessed with the past they can't see the present, much less the future, for what it{emph}is.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03EndingSlideFlag06
topics.response_text: {Narration}{Good or Neutral Karma}Where once it was viewed as a form of sadness, nostalgia, it became an expression describing the{emph}potential for the future.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03X8Countdown02
topics.response_text: TWO AS IN TOO LATE.{2D}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC03X8Countdown07
topics.response_text: SEVEN. YES, SEVEN.{2D}

conversation.response_text: {Slight grumble}I CAN HEAR YOUR PENIS-TIPPED FEET TROMPING AROUND.

combat.response_text: WERE YOU JUST TRYING TO GET MY ATTENTION?
IT'S THE SCHRÖDINGER BOX FOR YOU.
HOW DO YOU FIRE THIS THING?
{Fleeing}I WILL NOW USE ACCELERATION AND VELOCITY TO MY ADVANTAGE.
AIGH! MY TANK! IT PUT A DING IN IT!
